net.bytebuddy.agent.builder

类 AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener.BatchReallocator

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener
    封闭接口:
    AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener

    public static class AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener.BatchReallocator
extends AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener.Adapter

    A batch reallocator allows to split up a failed retransformation into additional batches which are reenqueed to the current retransformation process. To do so, any batch with at least to classes is rerouted through a AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.BatchAllocator which is responsible for regrouping the classes that failed to be retransformed into new batches.

    Important: To avoid endless looping over classes that cannot be successfully retransformed, the supplied batch allocator must not resubmit batches that previously failed as an identical outcome is likely.

      • BatchReallocator

        public BatchReallocator(AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.BatchAllocator batchAllocator)
        Creates a new batch reallocator.
        参数:
        batchAllocator - The batch allocator to use for reallocating failed batches.

    • 方法详细资料

      • splitting

        public static AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener splitting()
        Creates a batch allocator that splits any batch into two parts and resubmits these parts as two batches.
        返回:
        A batch reallocating batch listener that splits failed batches into two parts for resubmission.

      • onError

        public Iterable<? extends List<Class<?>>> onError(int index,
                                                  List<Class<?>> batch,
                                                  Throwable throwable,
                                                  List<Class<?>> types)
        从接口复制的说明: AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener
        Invoked upon an error during a batch. This method is not invoked if the failure handler handled this error.
        指定者:
        onError 在接口中 AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener
        覆盖:
        onError 在类中 AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.Listener.Adapter
        参数:
        index - A running index of the batch starting at 0.
        batch - The types included in this batch.
        throwable - The throwable that caused this invocation.
        types - All types included in the redefinition.
        返回:
        A set of classes which should be attempted to be redefined. Typically, this should be a subset of the classes contained in batch but not all classes.
